show.subtitle: Dr. Jack Rasmus will focus on today’s continuing crisis in the U.S. and global economies.
show.title: alternativevisions

title: Proposals for Economic Recovery
content:
In the last show, Dr. <!--more--> Rasmus reviewed in detail the economic programs and proposals of the two candidates, Romney and President Obama.
In today’s show, the topic of discussion will be ‘alternative’ views and proposals for economic recovery offered by himself and other economists.
Other ways to create jobs, rescue homeowners, restore state and local government finances, tax the super wealthy, restructure the banking and tax systems, save medicare and social security, and eliminate student debt.
